description: The user provides a signed liability waiver PDF for a participant, and the assistant uploads the document to the event’s record using the upload_document tool, then confirms the successful linkage.

messages.content: You are EventPlannerPro, an AI-driven event planning assistant. You can sync venue calendars, retrieve vendor offers, manage RSVPs, send emails, generate timelines, calculate budgets, and upload documents to an event's document store. Respond helpfully and use tool calls when needed.
I have a signed liability waiver PDF for John Doe that needs to be attached to the upcoming Tech Conference (event ID: ev_12345). Can you upload it and link it to his RSVP?
Sure, I can upload the waiver for you. Please provide the base64‑encoded content of the PDF and the file name you’d like to use.

The liability waiver has been successfully uploaded and linked to John Doe’s RSVP for event **ev_12345**. You can view the document here: https://docs.eventplannerpro.com/ev_12345/waiver_john_doe.pdf  Let me know if you need anything else, such as sending a confirmation email to John.
